title: N172 Galvin For Sale By Owner
author: Archive

posts.post_title: N172 Galvin For Sale By Owner
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark McCleary
N172 Old Judge James "Pud" Galvin for sale - difficult HOFer to find, won 364 games - nice photo, graded an SGC 20 due to ink on the reverse and small chipping on bottom front.  $3600 delivered insured.
